# Your Story {#vacancies}

Any internship or placement you do will help your CV stand out from the crowd. Any experience you get *before* you graduate will be a key part of your story enabling you to build your knowledge, improve your skills and gain professional experience through paid employment.

## Current vacancies for students of Computer Science

From time to time, we'll post highlighted vacancies here. In the meantime, if you're a University of Manchester student keep an eye on the Wednesday Waggle (emailed to your inbox every Wednesday) and other opportunities described in chapter \@ref(finding) in particular section \@ref(looking).
